alert.note: Alert for Greene; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:58PM EDT until July 24 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ulster County in east central New York... Greene County in east central New York... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 657 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Downsville to near Hazel to near Narrowsburg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Paltz, Ellenville, Hunter, Wallkill, Hurley, Woodstock, Windham, Prattsville, High Falls, Kerhonkson, Tillson, West Hurley, Napanoch, North-South Lake Campground, Woodland Valley Campground, West Shokan, Kenneth L Wilson Campground, Phoenicia, Mount Tremper and Lanesville. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
